Core redivivus in a sermon preached at Christ-Church Tabernacle in London upon Sunday, September 9, 1683, being a day of publick thanksgiving for the deliverance of His Sacred Majesties person and government from the late treasonable rebellion and fanatick conspiracy / by William Bolton ... Bolton, William, 1650 or 51-1691.
[2], 32, [1] p.
Printed for James Norris ..., London : 1684.
Advertisement: p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
